content: But this would impact the all-important STATS. LeBron isn’t going to play 15 minutes and finish with a 10/3/4 stat line. Same with any of the max player guys with major brands. The league is far too stat-driven. Contracts on and off the court are always (perhaps unfairly) driven by on-court measures. Also, this letter is about 10 times more competent than anything Goodell has ever written or said. Good stuff.
